news.text: Paper titled "GPU-based Image Compression for Efficient Compositing in Distributed Rendering Applications" was presented at %%LDAV%% (Big Data Analysis and Visualization) held in conjunction with IEEE Vis 2021.
Paper titled "Enabling Collaborative Interaction with 360° Panoramas between Large-scale Displays and Immersive Headsets" was presented as a poster at %%IEEE ISMAR%% 2021.

IEEE VR paper titled \Real-Time Omnidirectional Stereo Rendering: Generating 360° Surround-View Panoramic Images for Comfortable Immersive Viewing" was presented at %%ACM SIGGRAPH%% 2021 as an invited talk.

Paper titled "Real-Time Omnidirectional Stereo Rendering: Generating 360° Surround-View Panoramic Images for Comfortable Immersive Viewing" was presented at %%IEEE VR%% 2021. The paper was also nominated for Best Journal Paper!
Co-taught the %%Coding for Science%% high school computing workshop – a free 5-day enrichment experience hosted at Argonne National Laboratory.
Paper titled "PxStream: Remote Visualization for Distributed Rendering Frameworks" was presented at %%LDAV%% (Big Data Analysis and Visualization) held in conjunction with IEEE Vis 2019.

Extended abstract titled "Real-Time Compression of Dynamically Generated Images for Offscreen Rendering" was presented as a poster at %%LDAV%% (Big Data Analysis and Visualization) held in conjunction with IEEE Vis 2019.
Paper titled "Parallel Streaming between Heterogeneous HPC Resources for Real-time Analysis" was published in the %%Journal of Computational Science%%.
